EmailTemplate.name: Grand and Toy - Voicemail Follow Up (1559749348.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: Grand and Toy - Voicemail Follow Up (1559749348.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello Chelanne, I am following up with a quick email to the voicemail I had left you, my contact information can be found below and like I had said in the voicemail I wanted to get a better understanding of the business needs for Conair and I was advised by Joanne to speak with you. If you can provide some dates and times that work for you I will send an invite that matches my availability. Thank you and I look forward to connecting with you
Kind regards,
Michael DixonInside Account Manager <[[https://ca.linkedin.com/pub/mike-ager/1b/980/b8b]]>900 Belfast Rd, Ottawa ON, K1G 0Z6 | Tel: 1-800-348-2184 E. 42532 NEW! G&T Sustainability Report <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/CSR2015.aspx]]> | Exclusive Business Offers <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/whyGT-office-supplies-partner.aspx]]> | Green Initiatives <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/gg-corporate-citizenship-recycling-green-products.aspx]]> | Office Supplies <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/catalog/Office-Supplies/_/N-af2.aspx]]> | Furniture <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/catalog/Office-Furniture/_/N-acq.aspx]]>| Print & Documents <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/ImagingServices.aspx]]> | Facility Resources <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/catalog/Cleaning-Breakroom/_/N-a60.aspx]]> | Technology <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/catalog/Technology/_/N-86f.aspx]]>
CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE: The content of this e-mail (and attachments, if any) is privileged and confidential, and intended solely for its designated recipient(s). Any dissemination, distribution or copying of this e-mail, other than by its intended recipient(s), is strictly prohibited. If you have received this e-mail by error, please delete it and notify us immediately by reply e-mail.
